channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: OpenAI debated calling police about suspected Canadian shooter’s chats
item.description: Jesse Van Rootselaar's descriptions of gun violence were flagged by tools that monitor ChatGPT for misuse.

item.title: Suspect in Tumbler Ridge school shooting described violent scenarios to ChatGPT
item.description: The suspect in the mass shooting at Tumbler Ridge, British Columbia, Jesse Van Rootselaar, was raising alarms among employees at OpenAI months before the shooting took place. This past June, Jesse had conversations with ChatGPT involving descriptions of gun violence that triggered the chatbot's automated review system. Several employees raised concerns that her posts could […]...

item.title: Sam Altman Says Companies Are ‘AI Washing’ Layoffs
Pourquoi mon prochain écran devra intégrer la technologie G-Sync Pulsar de Nvidia (mais peut-être pas le vôtre)
item.description: Nvidia promet d'offrir un ressenti à 1000 Hz sur un écran LCD avec sa technologie G-Sync Pulsar. Nous avons pu la tester sur l'écran AOC AG276QSG2 et nous avons beaucoup de choses à en dire. Voici notre test.

item.title: La plus grande carte radio de l’Univers va révéler des secrets des trous noirs supermassifs
item.description: Le réseau Lofar (Low Frequency Array) est un radiotélescope virtuel de la taille de l'Europe et dont un des éléments est le radiotélescope de Nançay en France. Il nous permet de produire des cartes de plus en plus précises et complètes de sources sur la voûte céleste dans le domaine des ondes...

item.title: 7 days until ticket prices rise for TechCrunch Disrupt 2026
item.description: Lowest ticket prices to TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 end February 27. Up to $680 off individual passes and up to 30% off group passes. Register before they go up to join 10,000 founders, tech operators, and VCs.

item.title: I don't care if physical copies are delayed — game publishers and developers must do something to prevent early leaks and spoilers
item.description: Video game leaks and spoilers are infuriating, and they've left me no choice but to suggest controversial measures for game publishers and developers.

item.title: iPhone 17 Pro Max vs IPhone 3 GS perfectly illustrates 16 years of smartphone photography progress
item.description: I revived a 16-year-old iPhone 3GS and then compared the photos it takes with those of the iPhone 17 Pro Max.

item.title: Watchdog Says FAA Lacks Resources to Properly Oversee United Airlines
item.description: A new report says the agency’s oversight of United’s maintenance practices is hindered by under-resourced inspections.

item.title: The Pixel 10A and Soundcore Space One are just two of the best deals this week
item.description: Welcome to the weekend, folks! The Reviews and Guides team here at The Verge is gearing up for all things Unpacked, but Samsung isn’t the only one readying new phones. Google just announced the Pixel 10A, which, for you early adopters, is already up for preorder with a $100 gift card. Elsewhere in deal land, […]

item.title: Ces deux smartphones d’élite passent sous les 650 € : entre le Galaxy S25 et le Pixel 10, lequel choisir ?
item.description: Deux smartphones notés 8/10 et en promo sous les 650 euros : le Samsung Galaxy S25 et le Google Pixel 10 sont aujourd’hui, en 2026, des valeurs sûres. Ces deux références Android s’imposent comme d’excellents choix en promo, mais lequel choisir ?

item.title: Aerial_Knight’s DropShot captures the thrill of skydiving and makes it stylish
item.description: I've always wanted to go skydiving. Aerial_Knight's DropShot, from indie developer Aerial_Knight, lets me live out that dream - at least in a safe, virtual kind of way. It also lets me shoot bullets from finger guns, wield laser skulls, and wear cool sunglasses while I'm falling through the air. So maybe it's better than […]

item.title: ‘My love letter to an underappreciated work of art’: this is the one GameCube title that I want to see on Nintendo Switch Online
item.description: This obscure GameCube title is easily one of my favorites, and if it doesn’t get added to Nintendo Switch Online, it will be a giant disappointment.

item.title: Keeping the human touch in tech: what over-automation gets wrong
item.description: As AI scales across IT services, removing human judgement risks brittle systems, rising costs, and eroding customer trust.

item.title: The Mandalorian and Grogu: release date, trailer, cast, plot, and everything else we know about the new Star Wars movie
item.description: The Mandalorian and Grogu will arrive this May — here's what we know so far about the next Star Wars movie.

item.title: The secret to all those death-defying Olympic jumps is a giant plastic airbag
item.description: Winter sports have become more extreme, thanks to giant flop bags that let athletes test-run their most daring tricks. The highlight reel of the Milan Cortina 2026 Winter Olympics was defined by extreme tricks—corkscrews, twists, and flips performed by snowboarders and freestyle skiers.

item.title: How to watch Atalanta vs. Napoli online for free
item.description: How to watch Serie A for free. Watch Atalanta vs. Napoli in Serie A for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: The Samsung Galaxy S26 is tipped to get 2 smart camera upgrades – but the OnePlus 16 may show it up with an elite new telephoto sensor
item.description: We have some fresh rumors around two of the most powerful smartphones expected to launch this year.

item.title: How to watch India vs. South Africa in the 2026 T20 World Cup online for free
item.description: How to watch T20 World Cup for free. Live stream India vs. South Africa in the 2026 T20 World Cup for free from anywhere in the world.
